patthana17.4:4.1: Akusalaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.4:5.1: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:5.2: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:5.3: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:5.4: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naabyākato naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:5.5: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naabyākato naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:5.6: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:5.8: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha … pe … āsevane pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi, avigate cha.
patthana17.4:6.1: Kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.4:7.1: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.4:8.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
